instructions:
Combine and mix all ingredients except broccoli. Simmer broccoli in water 5 minutes, drain and stir into
above mixture. Pour into 1 1/2 quart casserole dish and bake uncovered in a 350 F oven for 30 minutes.
Serves 6.
ingredients: 1/2 cup dry Peppreridge Farm herb stuffing
name: Broccoli Casserole
creator: Carol Decker
